name: Sea Kayaking Or Sup Board & Snorkeling Combo
description: Towards the south coast, we can find the fishing village, where we take our kayaks or SUP to begin our paddling adventure towards our snorkeling destination, a beautiful small soft-sanded beach. In the clear waters of this paradise it is possible to find multicolored fish, rays, starfish, eels and urchins, among other marine life.
